Detailed Description

Error Codes, [GSM 04.80, 4.5].

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum SsErrorCode::Code
 

describes the problem code tags.

Enumerator:
MsIntSsError  Used when the SS operation was unsuccessful due to an MS internal reason.
MsIntSsTimeOut  This is used when the SS operation was unsuccessful due to an missing answer from the network.
UnknownSubscriber  The following error codes are sent by the network.
IllegalSubscriber 
BearerServiceNotProvisioned 
TeleserviceNotProvisioned
